unalcol.random.integer

Class IntUniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.random.Random<java.lang.Integer>
      • unalcol.random.integer.RandInt
        • unalcol.random.integer.IntUniform

  • public class IntUniform
extends RandInt

    Generates integer numbers following an uniform probability distribution

    Source code is available.
